_source.text: 10) If you're a lifelong Pats fan, a survivor of Rod Rust and Clive Rush, of lost eras and stupid errors, then you know better than to take this golden age of Boston sports for granted.

text: 10) If you're a lifelong Pats fan, a survivor of **Rod** **Rust** and **Clive** **Rush**, of lost eras and stupid
errors, then you know **better** **than** to take this golden age of Boston sports for granted.
